bug.author: azhavoro
bug.summary: Duplicated frames if task created from shared data
bug.description:
How to reproduce:
create following folder structure folder_1 │ └── folder_2 │ ├── image_folder_1 │ │ └── image1.jpeg │ └── image_folder_2 │ └── image2.jpeg
Choose share as data source during create a new task Press 'select files' button Expand folder_1 and select folder_2 Finish creating task Task will contain 4 images.
